channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Snapshot Backup
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Snapshot Backup

item.title: CVE-2024-7689|2024-09-09T13:18:59.260Z -- unknown -- snapshot%20backup
item.description: The Snapshot Backup WordPress plugin through 2.1.1 does not have CSRF check in some places, and is missing sanitisation as well as escaping, which could allow attackers to make logged in admin add Stored XSS payloads via a CSRF attack.

item.title: CVE-2024-7689|2024-09-09T06:00:02.765Z -- unknown -- snapshot%20backup
item.description: The Snapshot Backup WordPress plugin through 2.1.1 does not have CSRF check in some places, and is missing sanitisation as well as escaping, which could allow attackers to make logged in admin add Stored XSS payloads via a CSRF attack.
